articles.title: Emma Heming is having a hard time after Bruce Willis brain disorder diagnosis: reports - Geo News
articles.description: Bruce Willis’ Aphasia diagnosis has been ‘shocking’ for wife Emma as per reports
articles.content:
Bruce Willis wife, Emma Heming Willis, is reportedly going through a hard time after husbands Aphasia diagnosis.
An insider revealed to People Magazine that the actor's illness has been hard for the… [+1358 chars]
